snippet: Critics have called for an end to Texas’ Driver Responsibility Program, which assesses surcharges on certain traffic offenses, arguing that it traps poor citizens in a cycle of missed payments and suspended licenses.
lead_paragraph: Critics have called for an end to Texas’ Driver Responsibility Program, which assesses surcharges on certain traffic offenses, arguing that it traps poor citizens in a cycle of missed payments and suspended licenses.

headline.main: Traffic Offense Program Is Seen as a Trap for Poor Drivers, but Proves Hard to Kill
